column5: I guess not...after two hook-pulls and one line break...this bad boy decided to succumb to the net...     Might even be my personal best...

'Atta Boy Beano!!! Nice haul!! Z and I are on holidays for two weeks commencing the week of August 15. Maybe we can set up a day to carp-it together......would love to hook Z up with one of those hogs.  Meely
That would be great Meely...I'm always lookin' for an excuse to run down to my most favorite carp swim...might need a bigger brollie...
It's nice to see some bigguns are still swimming in there!  Great work!
Nice work Beans !!! Nice little setup ya got goin too  Thanks for sharing  Paul
Nice Norm, you still got it no doubt
Nice one that's a hog for sure.
Nice one my friend    Wish I would have been there to be your net man. This working for a living has it's drawbacks
Great fish Beans!!  Let's just call it a new PB!  Congrats!
Nice fishy ya got there Norm.  I have only been out 2 times for ol bugle mouths. Perhaps this weekend I will put an effort into it.  Cheers, Ron...

I musta somehow missed your post . . .    was just checkin' back this mornin,' and there ya wuzz, proudly displaying a 20+ pounder, so ya STILL got it! I was up on Saturday & Sunday, 5 fish both days, same as Ron. I think there was only one over 20 pounds . . .     most were 'turbo-charged 10  -  12 pounders. I had to give up the best fish of the weekend though . . . .     I just got 'im on, and I received a rather urgent message from Mother Nature, that I would be needing a 'nest' within the next few minutes. I hollered for Ron to 'reel in,' and navigate my fish in . . . .    I NEEDED TO DO SOME BUSINESS . . . . .    NOW! I didn't have a prayer of breaking off the 65 pound Power Pro, and was considerin' tying the fish to my back bumper, and reefin' 'in with the van! Lucky the 'nesting area' was only 2 minutes away . . .    3 minutes would have been messy! I have next Thursday & Friday off . . .    might go to Peterpatch, maybe to Trent River . . .   interested . . . .    Ron & the Brit are going too?
